meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gerald Dudley Mary Ann Borer Jonathan Greenan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7856.

td.p: Gerald Dudley, a pub quiz host and writer from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts
Mary Ann Borer, a marketing coordinator from Pomona, California
Jonathan Greenan, a human rights legal officer from Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,201)

tr.td: SISTER CITIES
RHYMES WITH MUG
POKER FACE
BAD ROMANCE
LADY GAGA

Jonathan
')
